J.S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE

7. Assignment: Unassigned
8. Unit: ZA
9. Incident: Self-Mutilation
10. Prohibited Act Code (s): 228

17. Comments of Inmate to Committee Regarding Above Incident:
18. A. It is the finding of the committee that you:
Commited the Prohibited Act as charged:
Did not Commit a Prohibited Act.
Commited Prohibited Act Code (s).
B. The Committee is referring the Charge(s) to the DHO for further Hearing
C. The Committee advised the inmate of its finding and of the right to file an appeal within 20 calendar days.
INSTRUCTIONS: All items outside of heavy rule are for staff use only. Begin entries with the number 1 and work up. Entries not completed will be voided by staff.

additional_notes: The document is an incident report from the Federal Bureau of Prisons regarding an incident involving inmate Jeffery Epstein. The report is partially filled out, with some sections containing handwritten or typed information, while others remain blank. The document includes redactions and a 'COPY' stamp.
